message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 16-1-4, translated into en
data: It is recommended that NSOs serve as the main contact for compiling and assuring the quality of the necessary data to report on SDG 16.1.4, in close coordination with other relevant bodies in the country. Automated and substantive validation procedures are in place when data are processed by custodian agencies to assess their consistency and compliance with standards.
